column1: The Purple Pig////Food: all of their dishes are going extreme. They're great creative and tasty ones
column2: don't take me wrong. But their spice use and flavor level is very extreme. Like the Chilled Calamari
column3: the calamari itself was so salty that your tongue would go numb for a few seconds if you have 3 bites in a row. So does the Eggplant Caponata
column4: the mixture of sourness and sweetness is the only thing you can taste of the bite. You can't even tell there are eggplants there. Roasted Bone Marrow
column5: same thing. It's like eating warm fat. It's like
column6: the cooks punch you with the pure flavors in the face. I'd appreciate if I can taste some of the textures of food more with lighter flavors.
